questions.question: 1.Reason for gradual decrease in cross-sectional area of the Spiral casing of the Francis turbine from the entrance to the tip is:

answers.b: To prevent loss of efficiency of the turbine due to friction
answers.c: To prevent leakage from the turbine
answers.d: To reduce material used, hence making it economical
